customer_reviews.title: not for iPhone iPad or any other iDevice
customer_reviews.text: Beware of advertisement! Sounds better than it is. There is a micro usb to charge android only. I cant understand why they all claim to fit iPhone when they do not provide the adapter! ..and shouldnt it read "water resistant" ? Claiming to sell a WATERPROOF product should be false advertising.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Get it before you regret it !!
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo beyond happy that I ordered this portable charger. It’s one of those things that you always have on the back of your mind and then when your electronic goes dead and you’re unable to charge it you wish and get mad at yourself for not having gotten it. It is extremely durable. I love it because I share it with my little one so I don’t have to be afraid of him being careless and getting it wet since it’s waterproof.

customer_reviews.title: but also useful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute charger, however, the included product sheet does not provide any info. After looking for instructions on line, I have several unanswered questions. How long does it take to charge? How do I know how much of a charge is left after I use it to charge my phone? What does the blinking red light mean? Is it charging or discharging? My previous charger, which was recalled by Amazon, showed the number of charged cells remaining. This was a very helpful indicator for charger life. Wish this one had that feature. Then it would not only be cute, but also useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
